name: places/ChIJ2YEPIYVYwokRZEFPR0RcaOI
formattedAddress: 76 W 85th St B, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 76 W 85th St B, New York, NY 10024-4519, USA

originalText.text: I started getting haircuts with Osamu in 2013 after a long and hard search on google maps (this was while I lived in the UWS). I have since moved to Miami, and now live in Pennsylvania. Every time I get my hair cut somewhere closer to me, I'm reminded that it truly is worth the trek into the city to see Osamu. No one else I have ever been to spends the time he does to ensure every snip is perfect, or consults with their clients so closely along the way. Osamu is totally committed to his craft; he literally draws sketches of each haircut he does for you and keeps files on each client, referencing his notes from the last time and whether or not you liked the cut. Who does this anymore?! It's impossible to find someone more dedicated to perfection and the art of hair than Osamu. He creates beautiful layers, and whenever I get a cut from him even if I wait 6 months for the next cut my hair still feels great. On top of this, the atmosphere is great and he does not pressure you to come in every 6-8 weeks like many stylists do. I could not possibly recommend Osamu more highly - he is THE BEST IN THE BUSINESS!!!

originalText.text: I love this salon. I have been for myself (short hair) and my teenage daughter (mid-lengh). Very consistent, calm, inviting, and professional! I really recommend their services.

text.text: I love this salon. I have been for myself (short hair) and my teenage daughter (mid-lengh). Very consistent, calm, inviting, and professional! I really recommend their services.

originalText.text: Unpretentious, warm and wonderful gem of a salon. Osamu is gifted, talented, kind and truly an artist. I was recently referred by a friend who had been going to him for a decade. My only wish is that I also found him 10 years ago!

text.text: Unpretentious, warm and wonderful gem of a salon. Osamu is gifted, talented, kind and truly an artist. I was recently referred by a friend who had been going to him for a decade. My only wish is that I also found him 10 years ago!

originalText.text: Osamu is an amazing hair stylist. I have been going to him for the last 20 years even before he had his own salon and he worked at some of the fancier salons in town. He is meticulous and always does a fantastic job on my hair. I only trust Osamu to cut my hair because of his amazing talent.

text.text: Osamu is an amazing hair stylist. I have been going to him for the last 20 years even before he had his own salon and he worked at some of the fancier salons in town. He is meticulous and always does a fantastic job on my hair. I only trust Osamu to cut my hair because of his amazing talent.

originalText.text:
Osamu is wonderful and creative and thoughtful and does beautiful work. I've been going to him for a few years (after following a woman up Madison Avenue to ask where she'd gotten her excellent hair cut...she gave me Osamu's contact info). Today, I asked him to cut off almost all my hair (14 inches!) so I could donate it. That left a pretty bedraggled handful of above-the-ears hair to work with...and I knew he'd find a way!
The atmosphere is as lovely as ever. Even in Covid, it feels safe. He's wonderful. His assistant is lovely. It's a superb place.
